author: JacobCakob
title: Lloyd's Mech
review:
It's a pretty good mech for the 4+ line

The mech is very green and has gold accents which gives it a nice feel and is fun to build, although you'll be done quickly due to how little pieces there are, the arms and legs can be posed pretty well, so you can position Lloyd to hold a pose whilst fighting the snake!

My main issue is that the legs are very bland due to only having 3 pieces making it 90% 1 shade of green, maybe adding a light green or gold round 2x2 tiles to the side of the knee areas would fix it.

The side build looks pretty good for how few pieces it has. The addition of the spider really adds to it.

The minifigures also are quite decent. I like how many shades of green this version of Lloyd has on him with both arms being different shades of green. The snake also has a pretty cool design, but I don't know if I like the grey and orange combination on it, it kinda clashes.

In conclusion, it's a pretty decent 4+ core set especially for the £9 price point
